title: help me please
body: My computer is Dell inspiron 15 7000 series. However, when I start the game it stops and I can't do anything. When I restart the computer, it works well. Do you know why? I was reported because of these reasons. Can you cancel my punish? I want to know the reason why it doesn't work and I want the penalty is to be canceled.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be running Windows 10 and be affected by the Windows Game Bar and its *Game DVR* feature, which has been causing similar problems. I recommend disabling this feature using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the problem.

Let me know if it did.
